# {ggplot2}: Basic pattern

```{r eval = FALSE}
ggplot(data, aes(x = ..., ...)) +
  geom_...(...)
```
---

# {ggplot2}: Example

```{r fig.width = 9, fig.height = 5}
ggplot(mpg, aes(x = displ, y = hwy)) +
  geom_point()
```
---

# {ggplot2}: Layers and facets

```{r eval = FALSE}
ggplot(data, aes(...)) +
  geom_...(aes(...), ...) +
  geom_...(aes(...), ...) +
  ... +
  facet_...(...)
```
